Mayor's Office
==============

### [Contact Us](https://www.tomsrivertownship.com/Directory.aspx)

1. ![Headshot of Mayor Daniel T. Rodrick](https://www.tomsrivertownship.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=10383 "Headshot of Mayor Daniel T. Rodrick")

   #### Daniel T. Rodrick

   Mayor

   [Email Mayor Rodrick](mailto:drodrick@tomsrivertownship.com)

   [More Information](https://www.tomsrivertownship.com/directory.aspx?eid=76)
2. #### Mayor's Office

   **Physical Address**
   View Map   
   33 Washington Street  
   Toms River, NJ 08754

     


   33 Washington Street Toms River NJ 08754

   [Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/33+Washington+Street++Toms+River+NJ+08754 "Open location on Google Maps")

     

   **Mailing Address**  
   P.O. Box 728  
   Toms River, NJ 08754

     

   Phone: 732-341-1000 ext.8255

   Fax: 732-244-9883

     

   [Directory](https://www.tomsrivertownship.com/directory.aspx?did=56)
